<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sacred Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=5931) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 99 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause. You gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. If you're [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), this resistance increases to 10 against unholy creatures, and if you're [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) it increases to 10 against holy creatures. In addition, creatures and effects that roll a natural 20 on an attack roll against you don't improve their result by one degree of success.
name: Sacred Defender
